Bringing a personal touch to innovation

CCH was created in 2006 as one of the first virtually managed estate agencies in South Africa - a haven for independent operators. We support them with a personal and cost-effective business model from which they can compete against other commission costly and more area restrictive estate agencies. Adapting to an everchanging world forms an integral part of our DNA. We made 3D virtual models part of our business 4 years before CV-19 forced the rest of the South African estate agencies to employ it for their mandates.

Benefits of Joining us

Up to 100%

2 Tier Cap System allows you to earn a real 95 & 100% of the commission when reaching R120 000 & R180 000 commission to company

Office Management Systems

Online access to sales and rental management systems – a 1-stop listing system to 42 property portals. Personalised CRM System for agents.

In-house Graphic Design

Continuous creation of marketing material & an online databank of hundreds of templates which can be personalized

Social Media Management

Daily content creation and posts on each of our member agent’s Facebook business pages. Social media marketing Campaigns for sole mandates.

Continuous Training

Weekly social distance enabled webinar training sessions & legal updates

Level up, and join the revolution.

Enjoy the support of an administrative team who are stake-holders in the business – literally earning a share of the company’s commission earnings. Our support team “cry or laugh” with our member agents.
